short_summary: The government wants to hire a company to maintain plumbery, repairs, instalations
description: The maintenance scope includes, but not limited to, the provision of necessary labor, supervision, transportation, materials, tools and equipment to carry out the standing offer agreement (SOA). The term of this Regional Individual Standing Offer will be for two (2)) years to provide the plumbing services. The individual call-up amounts will vary up to a maximum of $25,000 The Standing Offer is an agreement and not a contract.
